entry.title: UNLABELLED Wheat Straw Cutlery Kits
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mason Jar Lids Partners
Type: Supply
Price: 53.40

Product

Description

Price Per Unit

Price Total

12 Cutlery sets

fork, spoon, chopsticks, case

$4.45

$53.40
Recommended Retail:

Per Cutlery Kit = $9.99-$12.99

Expected Profit Margins = 50% - 62% 

Blank Design.  Add Your own branding or sell with no design :) 

Each Cutlery Kit Includes:
One Fork
One Spoon
One Set of Chopsticks
Carrying Case
Dimensions:
Individual Set - 8.25" long x 2.25" wide x 1" tall
Never Have to Use Disposable Cutlery Again!
These gorgeous Earth Loving cutlery kits are perfect for anywhere You are!
Camping
Restaurants
School
Vacations
Picnics
Work
DISHWASHER SAFE!
Why These Cutlery Kits Are Extra Special:
They are Made From Wheat Straw!
Wheat Straw is what is left after the grains and shaft are removed from a wheat stalk.
It is highly renewable and at this time is labeled as “agricultural waste”.
Takes up less space to manufacture = far less manufacturing impact.
Is freezable, microwavable, and dishwasher safe.
Acts like plastic but breaks down into organic material.
After years of use, simply toss into the compost.
How We Source Our Products:

North America Third
If we do not find items that are of the quality we require we go overseas.
We use manufactures that are monitored by a third party for compliance with FDA standards.
Items manufactured overseas will never touch the ocean as we have them all delivered by air.
These cutlery kits are produced in China
